blocks.content: Define the class of all posets (partially ordered sets) with weak ordering (e.g., "less than or equal to" instead of "less than"). A poset is a relation which is transitive, reflexive, and antisymmetric. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2008.)

blocks.name: isps
blocks.content: The predicate "is a poset" i.e. a transitive, reflexive, antisymmetric relation. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm isps(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cps), w3a(wrel(c0), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wceq(cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0)))))))
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cps, w3a(wrel(c0), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wceq(cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))))), w3a(wrel(cv(hs0)), wss(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), ccnv(cv(hs0))), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))))))
  3anbi123d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrel(cv(hs0)), wss(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), ccnv(cv(hs0))), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))))), wrel(c0), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wceq(cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0)))))
  releq(cv(hs0), c0)
  sseq12d(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqtrd(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), ccom(c0, c0), ccom(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  coeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))
  coeq2(cv(hs0), c0, c0)
  eqeq12d(cin(cv(hs0), ccnv(cv(hs0))), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ineq12d(cv(hs0), ccnv(cv(hs0)), c0, ccnv(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  cnveq(cv(hs0), c0)
  reseq2d(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), cuni(cuni(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieqd(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  df-ps(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wrel(c0), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wceq(cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isps(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ PosetRel ↔(Rel(c0)∧(c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ∧(c0 ⋂ `' c0)=(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0))))
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cps, (Rel(c0)∧(c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ∧(c0 ⋂ `' c0)=(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)), (Rel(hs0)∧(hs0 ∘ hs0)⊆ hs0 ∧(hs0 ⋂ `' hs0)=(= |` ⋃ ⋃ hs0)))
  3anbi123d(hs0 = c0, Rel(hs0), (hs0 ∘ hs0)⊆ hs0, (hs0 ⋂ `' hs0)=(= |` ⋃ ⋃ hs0), Rel(c0), (c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0, (c0 ⋂ `' c0)=(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0))
  releq(hs0, c0)
  sseq12d((hs0 ∘ hs0), hs0, (c0 ∘ c0), c0, hs0 = c0)
  eqtrd((hs0 ∘ hs0), (c0 ∘ c0), (c0 ∘ hs0), hs0 = c0)
  coeq1(hs0, c0, hs0)
  coeq2(hs0, c0, c0)
  eqeq12d((hs0 ⋂ `' hs0), (= |` ⋃ ⋃ hs0), (c0 ⋂ `' c0), (= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0), hs0 = c0)
  ineq12d(hs0, `' hs0, c0, `' c0, hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  cnveq(hs0, c0)
  reseq2d(cid, ⋃ ⋃ hs0, ⋃ ⋃ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieqd(⋃ hs0, ⋃ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  df-ps(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((Rel(c0)∧(c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ∧(c0 ⋂ `' c0)=(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)))
}

  sylan(wcel(c0, cps), wbr(c2, c0, c3), wcel(c3, universe), wrel(c0))
  brrelex2(c0, c2, c3)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cps), wa(wbr(c1, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c3)), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)))))))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cps), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)))))), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
  pstr2(c0)
  cotr(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cps), wa(wbr(c1, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c3)))

  spc3gv(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, universe, c2, universe, c3, universe, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))), wi(wa(wbr(c1, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c3)), wbr(c1, c0, c3)))
  imbi12d(w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wa(wbr(c1, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c3)), wbr(c1, c0, c3))
  anbi12d(w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(c1, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c3))
  3adant3(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), c3), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(c1, c0, c2)))

  breq12(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2), c3, c0)
  3syl(wcel(c0, cps), wi(wcel(c1, cuni(cuni(c0))), wbr(c1, c0, c1)), wceq(cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0)))), wral(hs0, cuni(cuni(c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))))
  simplbi(wceq(cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0)))), wral(hs0, cuni(cuni(c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  rspccv(hs0, cuni(cuni(c0)), c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(c1, c0, c1))

  breq12(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs0), c1, c0)

  adantrr(wcel(c0, cps), wbr(c1, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c1), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cps), wbr(c1, c0, c2), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wrel(c0))
  psrel(c0)
  brrelex12(c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cps), wa(wbr(c1, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c1)), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cps), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wceq(cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0)))))
  psref2(c0)
  simprbi(wceq(cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0)))), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wral(hs0, cuni(cuni(c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))))
  asymref2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cps), wa(wbr(c1, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c1)))
  spc2gv(hs0, hs1, c1, universe, c2, universe, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wi(wa(wbr(c1, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c1)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  imbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wbr(c1, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(c1, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c1))
  breq12(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  ancoms(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wb(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c0, c1)))
  breq12(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  eqeq12(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c2)

thm pslem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ PosetRel →(((c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c3)→ c1[c0]c3)∧(c1 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0 → c1[c0]c1)∧((c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c1)→ c1 = c2)))
} = {
  3jca(c0 ∈ PosetRel, ((c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c3)→ c1[c0]c3), (c1 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0 → c1[c0]c1), ((c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c1)→ c1 = c2))
  ex(c0 ∈ PosetRel, (c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c3), c1[c0]c3)
  syl3c((c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧(c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c3)), c1[c0]c3, ((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌)∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1, ∀(hs2,((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2)))), (c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c3))
  anim12dan(c0 ∈ PosetRel, c1[c0]c2, c2[c0]c3, (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylan(c0 ∈ PosetRel, c2[c0]c3, c3 ∈ 𝕌, Rel(c0))
  brrelex2(c0, c2, c3)
  adantr(c0 ∈ PosetRel, (c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c3), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1, ∀(hs2,((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2)))))
  sylib(c0 ∈ PosetRel, ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1, ∀(hs2,((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2)))), (c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0)
  pstr2(c0)
  cotr(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  simpr(c0 ∈ PosetRel, (c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c3))
  3expa(c1 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c3 ∈ 𝕌, (∀(hs0, ∀(hs1, ∀(hs2,((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2))))→((c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c3)→ c1[c0]c3)))
  spc3gv(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, universe, c2, universe, c3, universe, ((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2), ((c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c3)→ c1[c0]c3))
  imbi12d((hs0 = c1 ∧ hs1 = c2 ∧ hs2 = c3), (hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2), hs0[c0]hs2, (c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c3), c1[c0]c3)
  anbi12d((hs0 = c1 ∧ hs1 = c2 ∧ hs2 = c3), hs0[c0]hs1, hs1[c0]hs2, c1[c0]c2, c2[c0]c3)
  3adant3(hs0 = c1, hs1 = c2, hs2 = c3, (hs0[c0]hs1 ↔ c1[c0]c2))
  3adant1(hs0 = c1, hs1 = c2, hs2 = c3, (hs1[c0]hs2 ↔ c2[c0]c3))
  breq12(hs1, c2, hs2, c3, c0)
  3adant2(hs0 = c1, hs1 = c2, hs2 = c3, (hs0[c0]hs2 ↔ c1[c0]c3))
  breq12(hs0, c1, hs2, c3, c0)
  3syl(c0 ∈ PosetRel, (c1 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0 → c1[c0]c1), (c0 ⋂ `' c0)=(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0, hs0[c0]hs0))
  simplbi((c0 ⋂ `' c0)=(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0, hs0[c0]hs0), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1,((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0)→ hs0 = hs1))))
  rspccv(hs0, ⋃ ⋃ c0, c1, hs0[c0]hs0, c1[c0]c1)
  anidms(hs0 = c1, (hs0[c0]hs0 ↔ c1[c0]c1))
  breq12(hs0, c1, hs0, c1, c0)
  ex(c0 ∈ PosetRel, (c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c1), c1 = c2)
  syl3c((c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧(c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c1)), c1 = c2, (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1,((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0)→ hs0 = hs1))), (c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c1))
  adantrr(c0 ∈ PosetRel, c1[c0]c2, c2[c0]c1, (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  sylan(c0 ∈ PosetRel, c1[c0]c2, (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), Rel(c0))
  psrel(c0)
  brrelex12(c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ PosetRel, (c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c1), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1,((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0)→ hs0 = hs1))))
  syl(c0 ∈ PosetRel, ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1,((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0)→ hs0 = hs1))), (c0 ⋂ `' c0)=(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0))
  psref2(c0)
  simprbi((c0 ⋂ `' c0)=(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1,((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0)→ hs0 = hs1))), ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0, hs0[c0]hs0))
  asymref2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  simpr(c0 ∈ PosetRel, (c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c1))
  spc2gv(hs0, hs1, c1, universe, c2, universe, ((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0)→ hs0 = hs1), ((c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c1)→ c1 = c2))
  imbi12d((hs0 = c1 ∧ hs1 = c2), (hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0), hs0 = hs1, (c1[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c1), c1 = c2)

thm psssdm2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  dmin(c0, cxp(c1, c1))
  ineq12i(cdm(c0), cdm(cxp(c1, c1)), c2, c1)
  eqcomi(cdm(c0), c2)
  dmxpid(c1)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cps), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cin(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), cv(hs0)))
  syl21anbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cps), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cin(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)))
  elin2d(cv(hs0), c1, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cps), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c1))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cps), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c1)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cps), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  elinel1(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  psref(c0, cv(hs0), c2)
  brinxp2(cv(hs0), c0, c1, c1, cv(hs0))

  elin2d(hs0, c1, c2, (c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧ hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c1)))
  simpr(c0 ∈ PosetRel, hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c1))
  sylan2(c0 ∈ PosetRel, hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c1), hs0[c0]hs0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  elinel1(hs0, c2, c1)
  psref(c0, hs0, c2)
